mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.strategy_code AS "strategyCode", a.strategy_name AS "strategyName", a.strategy_context AS "strategyContext", a.strategy_type AS "strategyType", a.strategy_status AS "strategyStatus", a.strategy_condition AS "strategyCondition", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.remarks AS "remarks"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM Dispatch_strategy a
a.del_flag = '0'
ORDER BY ${orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Dispatch_strategy( id, strategy_code, strategy_name, strategy_context, strategy_type, strategy_status, strategy_condition, create_date, create_by, update_date, update_by, del_flag, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{strategyCode}, #{strategyName}, #{strategyContext}, #{strategyType}, #{strategyStatus}, #{strategyCondition}, #{createDate}, #{createBy}, #{updateDate}, #{updateBy}, #{delFlag}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE Dispatch_strategy SET
id = #{id},
strategy_code = #{strategyCode},
strategy_name = #{strategyName},
strategy_context = #{strategyContext},
strategy_type = #{strategyType},
strategy_status = #{strategyStatus},
strategy_condition = #{strategyCondition},
create_date = #{createDate},
create_by = #{createBy},
update_date = #{updateDate},
update_by = #{updateBy},
del_flag = #{delFlag},
remarks = #{remarks},
del_flag = '0' WHERE id = #{id}
